items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, Nice surprise !!
items.body: So cute, for the price I paid, I wasn't expecting such a nice sweater, nice navy blue with white stripe around the neck & cuffs, such a classy light sweater. To be worn inside on a cold day but in the fall, perfect. !! I'm 5 ft. 118 lbs got a medium cuz I listened to the reviews saying it runs small & it does, glad I ordered a Med., fits great with room to wear with a turtle neck too. Love this, nice surprise !! Early Christmas present for me . Can even wash in the machine. Read more
items.author: Jsoleil

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for tropical climate
items.body: It fitted perfectly it is soft and comfortable. Ilove the style. Ideal for cold weathein tropical climate. tropical climate. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and warm
items.body: Very soft material and warm. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good and not so goodðŸ™„
items.body: I bought the cinnamon pink white striped sweater in a size large, my new normal since I lost some weight. I'm 5'9" tall with a slender build. It fits as pictured in the Amazon ad. The sleeves are on the short side. It is a fitted sweater, and if you're buxom (I'm not), you might want to size up. If it shrinks one iota, I won't be able to wear it. It also feels soft to the touch, but when you put it on, it feels like wool. Prickly. It was inexpensive enough, so I'll keep it. But, I doubt I'll get much use out of it. My experience. Yours might be different. Read more
items.author: A. FAN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Sweater
items.body: Lovely sweater..washed and dried beautifully and is very soft! Size small fit me perfectly! Read more
items.author: Judy W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Sweater
items.body: I am very sartisfied with this sweater. The material is soft and well made. The price was extremely reasonable. I recommond this sweater. Read more
items.author: Rosalba Defonte

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Definitely looks better on the model. It's an ok sweater, nice thickness and the small was true to size. Read more
items.author: Darlene Hallmark

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend
items.body: The sweater looks exactly like the picture. It is soft and is a flattering fit. I plan on buying other sweaters from this seller. Read more
items.author: Anonymous1234567

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cinnamon Pink White Striped, Blue White, Gray, Caramel White, Apricot, White Purple Color Block, Black, Coffee, Blue Green White, Apricot Black, Navy Blue White Striped, White Black Striped, Pink Red, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
